properties.title: Apache James Server 3 - Core components Configuration

section.name: Core components Configuration
section.p: This section presents James core components configuration.

Core components includes:
Domain lists: allows dynamic management of the domains handled by this James server. Features some configurable auto-detection.
DNS service: configuration of domain name resolution for James
Mailet container: explains how to configure Mail processing. Mails pass through the MailetContainer. The MailetContainer is a Matchers and Mailets pipeline arranged into processors.
Mail repository store: Allows the administrator to store mail being processed in the mailet-container.
Recipient Rewrite Table: Allows address rewriting.
Users repository: Stores users handled by this James server.
Note that once configured, you can use CLI or WebAdmin to manage them.
